dataIdInfo.idAbs: The Stream Sinuosity and Planform tool calculates sinuosity (per segment) for valley centerline and flowline networks. The tool also transfers the valley sinuosity to the stream network and calculates river planform attribute.
dataIdInfo.idCredit: South Fork Research, Inc. Kelly Whitehead, Jesse Langdon

tool.name: PlanformTool

param.name: InputFCStreamNetwork
param.dialogReference: Segmented stream network features (i.e. flowline, centerline, etc). Stream sinuosity will be calculated for each segment.

param.name: InputFCValleyCenterline
param.dialogReference: Segmented valley bottom centerline features. Valley sinuosity will be calculated for each segment.

param.name: InputFCValleyPolygon
param.dialogReference:
The valley bottom polygon of the stream network. Required input for the Transfer Line Attribute tool.

Note: This required input will be depreciated in a future version of this tool.

param.name: OutputFCCenterline
param.displayname: Output Stream Network with Sinuosity Attribute
param.dialogReference: Output polyline feature class for saving the segmented stream network with calculated sinuosity.

param.name: OutputFCValleyCenterline
param.displayname: Output Valley Centerline with Sinuosity Attribute
param.dialogReference: Output polyline feature class for storing the valley bottom centerline with calculated sinuosity.

param.name: OutputFCPlanformCenterline
param.displayname: Output Stream Network with Planform Attribute
param.dialogReference: Output polyline feature class for storing the stream centerline with calculated planform attribute.

param.name: scratchWorkspace
param.dialogReference: Workspace that will store intermediate data files.

tool.summary: The Stream Sinuosity and Planform tool calculates sinuosity (per segment) for valley centerline and flowline networks. The tool also transfers the valley sinuosity to the stream network and calculates river planform attribute.
tool.usage:
The Stream Sinuosity and Planform tool uses the following calculation method:

1. Use Sinuosity By Stream Segment tool for stream and valley centerlines

1. Convert segment ends to points

2. Convert points to line to find straight line distance

3. Calculate sinuosity (straight distance / segment distance)

2. Transfer valley bottom sinuosity to stream centerline using Transfer Line Attribute tool

3. Calculate planform metric for each divided segment
